Articles.Content: In Kerbal Space Center screen, I can't select any building. I started a spaceplane, landed, recovered the ship, got science and couldn't enter tracking station to recover Debris. Tried other buildings, but I couldn't select any of them. Tried it in science mode and sandbox mode, didn't work. The buildings don't get highlighted too.

Have you tried restarting KSP? Sometimes the game looses track of the bounding and things become unclickable (or the boxes move to strange places). Restarting often helps.

Otherwise we'll need a bit more info. Check this sticky and it'll help you out.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92230

Cheers,

~Claw

It seems that restarting the game worked. Thanks.

Problem solved, close topic.
